assumptions.assumption: Sales agents have stable internet connection for Zoom calls
assumptions.impact: Recording quality and WebSocket sync reliability
assumptions.mitigation: Implement graceful degradation and reconnection logic

assumptions.assumption: Prospects are pre-qualified through EUR 495 payment gate
assumptions.impact: Reduces unqualified prospect volume in the system
assumptions.mitigation: System still enforces 500+ client qualification gate

assumptions.assumption: Financial advisors/brokers understand German business context
assumptions.impact: Content and terminology appropriate for target market

assumptions.assumption: GoHighLevel is the primary CRM for lead management
assumptions.impact: All CRM sync flows designed for GHL API
assumptions.mitigation: Abstraction layer allows future CRM integrations

assumptions.assumption: Recording consent is obtained before call starts
assumptions.mitigation: Pre-call checklist includes consent verification step

assumptions.assumption: Zoom API provides reliable bot join functionality
assumptions.impact: Recording pipeline depends on successful bot join
assumptions.mitigation: Retry logic with fallback to manual recording

assumptions.assumption: AI analysis can complete within 2 minutes post-call
assumptions.impact: User experience for viewing call insights
assumptions.mitigation: Async processing with notification when complete

assumptions.assumption: Agents follow the diagnostic approach without persuasion
assumptions.mitigation: Guardrails system blocks persuasion content at config level

assumptions.assumption: Modern browser support (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge - latest 2 versions)
assumptions.impact: WebSocket and modern JavaScript feature availability

assumptions.assumption: 500+ client threshold is non-negotiable for coaching eligibility
assumptions.impact: Hard gate prevents override at any level
